statements: DELETE FROM printer_maintenance WHERE task = 'Replace Toner';
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE task_id = 10 AND completion_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE task_id = 3 AND frequency > 10;
DELETE FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE issue_encountered LIKE '%broken%';
DELETE FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency > 10 AND issue_encountered LIKE '%critical%';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE performed_by = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE printer_id = 101 AND task_id = 5;
DELETE FROM Printers WHERE manufacturer = 'HP' AND purchase_date < '2021-01-01';
